name: Asylum (itch) (AxayTEEHEE)
description:
"Asylum" is a bone-chilling horror game that will take you on a terrifying journey through the dark corridors of an abandoned mental institution. In this game, you will play as a patient who wakes up in the asylum with no memory of how they got there.

As you explore the desolate building, you will uncover the secrets of the asylum's dark past and face unspeakable horrors that lurk around every corner. You will encounter supernatural entities, solve puzzles, and navigate through a maze of twisted and distorted realities.

With each step, you will feel your sanity slipping away as you struggle to survive in this nightmarish world. Can you escape the clutches of the asylum and the evil that haunts it, or will you succumb to the madness that surrounds you? Play "Asylum" and find out...if you dare.

*This game is under development and is buggy, if you find any bugs feel free to report and suggest additions and changes :)*
